categories: Category:From a Certain Point of View (series)

nodes.text: From a Certain Point of View (audiobook)

From a Certain Point of View is the unabridged audio version of the canon short-story anthology book of the same name. The audiobook features narrations by staple performers like Marc Thompson and January LaVoy, as well as celebrities Jon Hamm and Neil Patrick Harris. It was released by Random House Audio on October 3, 2017.

Although described officially as unabridged, the audiobook does not include any form of the comic "Far Too Remote," by Jeffrey Brown. This is likely because of the story's comic format, which would not work without visuals.
